#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n+1];
        int win,tie,i;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&win);
            a[i]=3*win;
        }
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&tie);
            a[i]+=tie;
        }
        win=a[1];
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
            if(win<a[i])
                 win=a[i];
        printf("%d\n",win);
    }
    return 0;
}
